Book Now

Accomodation

The resort has a total of 97 rooms made up of Hotel Suites, 2 and 3 Bedroom Chalets, and Villas, and is sure to have the perfect option to accommodation any type of business, leisure, family or large group travelers comfortably.

All Self Rated 4 Star, 2 Bedroom Chalets are selectively scattered amongst the resort grounds enjoying either magnificent Lake, Mountain, Garden or Golf Course views whilst offering a homely comfortable atmosphere.

  • HOTEL ROOMS
  • VILLAS & CABIN
  • CHALETS & FAMILY ACCOMODATION
Book Now

Swiss Village

The Swiss Village at Grindelwald is a wonderful location for a day visit on your next trip to Launceston and the Tamar Valley.

The village is set in the grounds of Tamar Valley Resort and has a range of activities, dining and shopping options.

If you are after a touch of retail therapy be sure to visit the Grindelwald clothing boutique, or the Grindelwald News & Gift shop!

  • GRINDELWALD CLOTHING BOUTIQUE
  • GRINDELWALD BAKERY CAFE
  • GRINDELWALD SWEETS AND TREATS
  • MISS-A-SIPPY CAFE
  • NEWS AND GIFT SHOP
Visit us

Activities

Aspect Tamar Valley Resort has everything you need for a short break getaway with extensive indoor/outdoor recreational facilities available as well as a choice of hotel suite or self catering chalet accommodation.

Why not make use of the modern fully equipped health club with gymnasium, heated indoor pool, sauna, heated spa, childs wading pool and more.

  • Putt-it Mini Golf
  • HEALTH CLUB / GYM / POOL
  • ACTIVITY CENTRE
  • CAR HIRE
